title: Textile, "Length of block printed linen", 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Polychrome block print on white natural linen. Serpentine branches with fantastic flowers in red, pale blue with patterned petals and wild scrolling leaves in red and green. Pattern repeats in one-half drop. Condition: soiled

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Length of block printed linen", 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-92.
